thread.title: Patriots look to leave Colts feeling 'deflated'
thread.title_full: Patriots look to leave Colts feeling 'deflated'

title: Patriots look to leave Colts feeling 'deflated'
text:
Patriots look to leave Colts feeling 'deflated' Patriots look to leave Colts 'deflated' Post to Facebook Patriots look to leave Colts feeling 'deflated' Patriots look to leave Colts 'deflated'   wcsh6.com: http://on.wcsh6.com/1RIWV0X   Join the Conversation To   Patriots look to leave Colts feeling 'deflated' Patriots prep for Colts WCSH Johnny Mehler, WLBZ 8:18 p.m. EDT October 14, 2015 Pats prep for Colts CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
FOXBORO, Massachusetts (NEWS CENTER) -- During a week that was supposed to be focused on Tom Brady, that focus shifted when it was announced that Nate Solder would miss the remainder of the season. 
Solder was placed on the injured reserve list with a right biceps tear. 
The rest of the team will prepare for the Indianapolis Colts. 
As NEWS CENTER's Johnny Mehler reports, the players don't see this game differently than any other game that they played so far this season even if this is the first time the Patriots and Colts are meeting since 'Deflategate' began. 
Don't forget, you can watch the Patriots take on the Colts on NEWS CENTER Sunday night. Coverage begins at 7:00 PM.  //on.wcsh6.com/1RIWV0X TOP VIDEOS
